scripts.cy:open: concurrently 'BROWSER=none yarn start' 'wait-on 'http-get://localhost:3000' && cypress open --browser firefox' --kill-others --success first
scripts.cy:open:proxy: concurrently 'BROWSER=none yarn start:proxy' 'wait-on 'http-get://localhost:3000' && cypress open' --kill-others --success first
scripts.cy:open:capture: concurrently 'BROWSER=none yarn start' 'wait-on 'http-get://localhost:3000' && cypress open --env networkMode=capture' --kill-others --success first
scripts.cy:open:stub: concurrently 'BROWSER=none yarn start' 'wait-on 'http-get://localhost:3000' && cypress open --env networkMode=stub' --kill-others --success first
scripts.cy:capture: concurrently 'yarn cy:start' 'yarn cy:run --env networkMode=capture --browser firefox' --kill-others --success first
